invitation.subtitle: Here you can find all the invitations to studies that you have been invited to.
invitation.roles_in_the_study.title: Roles in the Study
invitation.roles_in_the_study.descriptio: As a participant, you and this device will play the role(s) as
pages.location.info:
This app collects location data.

We ask you to enable the location service on the phone by allowing tracking of location 'Always'. The location service will keep the app running in the background, which helps us collect the data.

We use the location data in our subsequent data analysis. in order to calculate how much time you spend at home, for example.
login.failed_login: It seems you do not have access to this study. Contact your researcher to get access.

pages.devices.type.smartphone.instructio: This phone is already connected to the study
pages.devices.type.esense.instructions:
You should connect the LEFT earbud to this study. Turn on the left earbud by pressing and holding the push button until it blinks red. Now you should be able to select the left earbud in the list of devices.

If you want to use the eSense earbuds for audio streaming, you should connect the RIGT earbud to the phone using the phone's Bluetooth SETTINGS. To pair an earbud to the phone, press and hold the button until it starts blinking blue and red. Now the earbud is in paring mode. Once the earbud is connected to the phone, it will indicate so by blinking in blue.
pages.devices.type.polar.instructions:
Make sure that your Polar device is turned on. The Polar H10 chest strap is automatically turned on when it is attached to your chest. The Polar Verity Sense arm strap needs to be turned on by pressing the button on the side until the LEDs turns on.

To pair the Polar device with the phone, open the Bluetooth settings of the phone and click on the Polar device.
pages.devices.type.movesense.instruction: Please mount your Movesense device in the strap and mount it on your chest. The Movesense device is automatically turned on and a small LED should be blinking red. If not, you may need to change the battery on the back of the device.
pages.devices.connection.bluetooth_autho: This app needs authorization to pair with Bluetooth. Please authorize the app following the steps shown in the photo below.
pages.devices.connection.enable_bluetoot: Bluetooth needs to be turned on. Open Bluetooth settings by clicking the button at the end and turn on Bluetooth.
If Bluetooth is already turned on, make sure that you are allowing for new connections by clicking the option depicted in the image below in settings.
pages.devices.connection.disconnect_blue: Are you sure you want to disconnect
pages.devices.connection.step.start.2: device you want to connect and press 'NEXT'.
pages.devices.connection.step.start.3: If the device is not in the list, make sure it is charged and turned on. Read more in the 'INSTRUCTIONS'.
pages.devices.connection.step.confirm.2: device has successfully been connected to the phone and is now used for collection of data in this study.
pages.devices.type.health.instructions.p: Read the instructions on the next page to connect
On the next screen please tap

pages.login.internet_connection.enable_i: Wi-Fi or mobile data needs to be turned on to log in. Please turn on Wi-Fi or mobile data.
You can access Wi-Fi settings using the 'Wi-Fi' button at the end. Turn Wi-Fi on and select a network.
To turn on mobile data, click the 'Data' button at the end of the page and turn on the button depicted in the image below.
